import React from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import RemoveImg from "../assets/imgs/remove.png"; import format from '../configs/USDCurrency' export default function CartItem(props) { const { item } = props; return (
{item.product.name}
Blue, S
-
{item.count}
+
{format(item.product.price * item.count)}
); }
